Please use the MinifyCode to compress HTML, CSS and JavaScript because build load.

Backgroud:
http://minifycode.com/html-minifier
MinifyCode
MinifyCode is a quick web tool to compress or decompress HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

http://www.3rank.com/tools-to-minify-code/
Minify HTML
Having compressed HTML files online could save you a lot of money on your server bills if you are hosting a very heavy bandwidth website.
These compression tools will save space in HTML files by removing text line breaks, tab spaces, and replacing double spaces with single spaces without breaking the content structure.
